name: Reaper of clicker
description:
Reaper of clicker is an atmospheric clicker imbued with magic and magical phenomena. 

   Attack the Reaper with physical and all other abilities. Pump up your level and attacking skills , and do not forget about ultra pumping.

                                                               Control
